ItemTooltips.ghost: If physical carries are giving you problems, ghost scepter is your &amp;quot;Get out of Jail&amp;quot; card.
ItemTooltips.null_talisman: These help bolster Queen of Pain's mana pool and her survivability.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: A fast Scythe of Vyse is scary on a ganking hero like Queen of Pain. Keep your foes down and taking all your damage with this item. Generally, this should be your first item to shoot for.
ItemTooltips.orchid: Increase your damage and crowd-control with this item. Easy to build, great amplified damage for all your moves and extra attack speed for your decent autoattack output.
ItemTooltips.dagon: Early-game dominance? Get a Dagon and keep that lead! Obliterate foes with a combination of your abilities. With Dagon, be sure the gank constantly.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: More damage, but get this after level 11 since it does not affect the damage of your ultimate at level 1 (just the cooldown).
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: When jumping into the fray, Black King Bar should ensure you are not prevented from dealing all that initial damage. A double safety-pin alongside Orchid Malevolence.
ItemTooltips.sphere: The stats are good and the protective shell from targetable abilities is always a nice safety measure for Queen of Pain.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: At this point of the game, you pretty much have everything you need. This is to help your autoattack damage output since you have all this attack speed and established magic-damage.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: Veil of Discord is pretty good considering your line-up. If you find most of your team are magic-damaging nukers, Veil of Discord is a safe bet.

AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_shadow_strike: Shadow Strike is your slow, due to its consistent mana cost and the extra damage provided from Scream of Pain, it's generally maxed last due to priority.
AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_blink: Use this to disjoint stuns and ranged attacks. It will disrupt the damage and allow you to avoid danger.
AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_scream_of_pain: Incredible damage, this nearly kills most frail enemies with your ultimate. Blink in, pop Scream of Pain, then your ultimate and finish fleeing foes with your Shadow Strike.
AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_sonic_wave: An incredible nuke and a huge range, Sonic Wave is a great item to dish out in team-fights. This should be your follow-up from Scream of Pain.
